Text:
I don't know why you use .rar files.  Why do the folks at torrentkit.com INSIST that .rar files be used?  They can buy 21st century computers that can handle large files, can't they?

It's potentially dangerous to download compressed files because you just don't know what's really packed inside them.
Are you going to seed the last 30MB or just let all of us sit here at 99.9% ?
Been at 99.9% for at least 3 weeks now.  Wouldn't bother trying to download.
